remarks: Condition for function equality in terms of vanishing of the composition with the converse. _EDITORIAL_:  Is there a relation-algebraic proof of this?  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 12-Feb-2015.)
statement: foeqcnvco $p |- ( ( F : A -onto-> B /\ G : A -onto-> B ) -> ( F = G <-> ( F o. `' G ) = ( _I |` B ) ) ) $.
